DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study test safety effectiveness MK6213 compare MK6213/Atorvastatin patient ( 18 75 year ) high cholesterol .
DOC.brief_title: A Study MK6213 Co-Administered With Atorvastatin Patients With Hypercholesterolemia ( MK-6213-006 ) ( COMPLETED )
DOC.criteria: Patient 18 75 year age time study high cholesterol diabetes mellitus currently lipid lower therapy stable weight > 6 week Patient significant cardiovascular ( heart ) , renal ( kidney ) , neurologic ( nervous system ) , respiratory ( lung ) , hepatic ( liver ) metabolic disease history mental instability drug/alcohol abuse within past 5 year pregnant nursing ; HIV positive ; history cancer within past 5 year participation investigational trial within last 30 day
